title: MX Player Pro v1.7.40 Apk.apk
description:
MX Player Pro

a) MULTI-CORE DECODING â€“ MX Player is the first Android video player that performs multi-core decoding. According to the test results on dual-core devices, it shows up to 70% performance improvement than single-core devices.

b) CPU OPTIMIZATION â€“ Provides highly optimized codecs and Rendering Engines for the processors including ARMÂ® NEONâ„¢ and NVIDIAÂ® Tegraâ„¢ 2.

c) PINCH ZOOM â€“ Easily zoom in and out by pinching and swiping across screen.

d) SUBTITLE SCROLL â€“ Scroll on subtitle text and playback position will be adjusted to match previous or next subtitle timing.

e) KIDS LOCK â€“ Keep your kids entertained without having to worry about making calls or touching other apps. (plugin required)

f) ANDROID 4.0 â€“ Fully supports Android 4.0 Ice Cream Sandwich.

Subtitle Formats:

â€“ DVD, DVB, SSA/ASS Subtitle Tracks.
â€“ SubStation Alpha(.ssa/.ass) with full styling.
â€“ SAMI(.smi/.sami) with ruby tag support.
â€“ SubRip(.srt)

â€“ SubViewer2.0(.sub)

Whatâ€™s in this version :

    Improved Android TV support.
    Improved background play interface.
    Added â€˜A-B repeatâ€™ feature.
    Added subtitle speed setting under subtitle submenu.
    Added S/W audio (network) under Settings > Decoder
    Handles mouse wheel movement on playback screen. Also can
    select behavior on Playback screen > Menu > Display > Settings >
    Touch > Wheel action. (This option is not visible unless a mouse is attached)

Requires Android:2.1 and up
